means: 九十几，九十年代( ninety的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Into her nineties, her thinking remained acute and her character forceful.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽已年届九旬，她依然头脑敏锐，个性很强。

sentence.Network_en: These trends only got worse as we moved into the nineties.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们步入20世纪90年代时，这些潮流变得更糟了。

sentence.Network_en: By this time she was in her nineties and needed help more and more frequently.
sentence.Network_cn: 到这个时候她已经90多岁了，越来越频繁地需要帮助。

PerfectNetExp.abs: He was born in the nineties of the nineteen century ., 他生于十九世纪九十年代.

list.abs: the time span of a draft ( e.g. ninety days ) is called tenor .汇票允许的时间期限（如90天)叫汇票期限。
The ear was doing better than ninety miles an hour ., 汽车时速超过每小时九十英里.
Your rent would only be ninety dollars a month ., 这儿每月付九十美元租金就行.
the best the writer recalls , was an aunt who lived in a tiny country cottage and maintained an old-world dignity on ninety pounds a year .笔者记忆中最可亲的人是我的姑妈。她住在乡间小农舍，靠一年九十英镑的收入维持着她旧式生活的尊严。

example.ex: It was decided she had to stay another ninety days.
example.tran: 已经决定了，她不得不再呆90天。

entry.def: When you talk about the nineties, you are referring to numbers between 90 and 99. For example, if you are in your nineties, you are aged between 90 and 99. If the temperature is in the nineties, the temperature is between 90 and 99 degrees.

example.ex: By this time she was in her nineties and needed help more and more frequently.
example.tran: 到这个时候她已经90多岁了，越来越频繁地需要帮助。

entry.def: The nineties is the decade between 1990 and 1999.

example.ex: These trends only got worse as we moved into the nineties.
example.tran: 我们步入20世纪90年代时，这些潮流变得更糟了。

means.word_mean: 3. the time of life between 90 and 100

auth_sentence.content: In the mid-Nineties we spoke to people with ambition.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the mid-Nineties we spoke to people with ambition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the mid-Nineties we spoke to people with ambition.

auth_sentence.content: This was years ago, in the early nineties.
auth_sentence.res_content: This was years ago, in the early nineties.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This was years ago, in the early nineties.

auth_sentence.content: Prosecutors say the nineteen-eighties; he says the nineties.
auth_sentence.res_content: Prosecutors say the nineteen-eighties; he says the nineties.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Prosecutors say the nineteen-eighties; he says the nineties.
